document.full_text: braves pitching coach roger mcdowell was suspended for two weeks without pay sunday by major league baseball for inappropriate comments and gestures he made toward fans.
document.title: braves' mcdowell gets fine, 2-week ban
lines_and_colors: braves pitching coach roger mcdowell was suspended for two weeks without pay sunday by major league baseball for inappropriate comments and gestures he made toward fans.
